title: Traditional IRA Calculator
description: Bankrate.com provides a FREE traditional IRA calculator and other 401(k) calculators to help consumers determine the best option for retirement savings.
cleaned_text: Traditional IRA Calculator Calculate your earnings and more Contributing to a traditional IRA can create a current tax deduction, plus it provides for tax-deferred growth. While long-term savings in a Roth IRA may produce better after-tax returns, a traditional IRA may be an excellent alternative if you qualify for the tax deduction. Use this traditional IRA calculator to view the amount that could be saved using a traditional IRA.
